description:
The two main goals of this course are:

  1. You will receive all the necessary tools to build and grow a successful blog
  2. You will build yourself a strong and solid online presence to help you become an online influencer

Students can expect the following from this course:

  1. A step-by-step guide that will take you through every aspect needed to build a professional looking and successful blog
  2. My personal experiences and the tricks that have helped me grow my blog and online influence
  3. An interactive guide broken down into bite size sessions
  4. A checklist at the end of each session to help you assess your evolution

This step-by-step guide to a successful blog course is divided into 13 sessions and has about 3 hours of content.
title: A step-by-step guide to starting a successful blog
